com.bit6.sdk.websocket

Interface WebSocket.WebSocketConnectionObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebSocketConnectionHandler
    Enclosing interface:
    WebSocket

    public static interface WebSocket.WebSocketConnectionObserver
    Session handler for WebSocket sessions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  WebSocket.WebSocketConnectionObserver.WebSocketCloseNotification 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBinaryMessage(byte[] payload)
      Fired when a binary message has been received.
      void onClose(WebSocket.WebSocketConnectionObserver.WebSocketCloseNotification code, java.lang.String reason)
      Fired when the WebSockets connection has deceased (or could not established in the first place).
      void onOpen()
      Fired when the WebSockets connection has been established.
      void onRawTextMessage(byte[] payload)
      Fired when a text message has been received (and text messages are set to be received raw).
      void onTextMessage(java.lang.String payload)
      Fired when a text message has been received (and text messages are not set to be received raw).

    • Method Detail

      • onOpen

        void onOpen()
        Fired when the WebSockets connection has been established. After this happened, messages may be sent.

      • onClose

        void onClose(WebSocket.WebSocketConnectionObserver.WebSocketCloseNotification code,
           java.lang.String reason)
        Fired when the WebSockets connection has deceased (or could not established in the first place).
        Parameters:
        code - Close code.
        reason - Close reason (human-readable).

      • onTextMessage

        void onTextMessage(java.lang.String payload)
        Fired when a text message has been received (and text messages are not set to be received raw).
        Parameters:
        payload - Text message payload or null (empty payload).

      • onRawTextMessage

        void onRawTextMessage(byte[] payload)
        Fired when a text message has been received (and text messages are set to be received raw).
        Parameters:
        payload - Text message payload as raw UTF-8 or null (empty payload).

      • onBinaryMessage

        void onBinaryMessage(byte[] payload)
        Fired when a binary message has been received.
        Parameters:
        payload - Binar message payload or null (empty payload).
